Package: org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation

[Groovy] Class PullOp

    • org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.PullOp
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      java.util.concurrent.Callable

      class PullOp
extends java.lang.Object

      Pulls changes from the remote on the current branch. If the changes conflict, the pull will fail, leaving the working tree as-is, and throwing an exception.

      Pull changes.

       grgit.pull()
 grgit.pull(rebase: false)

      Pull changes and rebase the current branch on top of the remote changes.

       grgit.pull(rebase: true)

      Pull changes from another remote.

       grgit.pull(remote: 'other-remote')

      Pull changes from another branch.

       grgit.pull(branch: 'other-branch')
      See git-pull Manual Page.
      See Also:
      git-pull Manual Page
      Since:
      0.2.0

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String  branch
          The name of the remote branch to pull.
          boolean  rebase
          Rebase on top of the changes when they are pulled in, if true.
          java.lang.String  remote
          The name of the remote to pull.

      • Property Detail

        • java.lang.String branch

          The name of the remote branch to pull. If not set, the current branch's configuration will be used.

        • boolean rebase

          Rebase on top of the changes when they are pulled in, if true. false (the default) otherwise.

        • java.lang.String remote

          The name of the remote to pull. If not set, the current branch's configuration will be used.
